alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 08 at 6:50PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Brantley, east central Ware and northeastern Charlton Counties through 730 PM EST... At 649 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm and showers centered 8 miles west of Homeland, or 9 miles west of Folkston, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nahunta, Homeland, Hickox, Braganza, Race Pond, Fort Mudge and Winokur. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Brantley; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Western Charlton
